  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124ac11-3138-415e-26a2-b581dcf8dfbe#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A rajzművészet technikái</string>
            <string language="en">the techniques of drawing art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Techniken des Zeichnens von von kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les techniques de dessiner l'art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as técnicas de desenhar a arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le tecniche di dissipare arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι τεχνικές την τέχνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las técnicas de trazar arte</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A rajzművészet technikái</string>
            <string language="en">the techniques of drawing art</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">9.évfolyam,  rajzoló eljárások,  szénrajz,  krétarajz,  grafit,  ezüstvessző,  tus,  tollrajz,  </string>
            <string language="en">9th century, drawing proceedings, coal draw, chalk draw, wad, silver rod, douche, pendraw</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Techniken des Zeichnens von von kunst</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les techniques de dessiner l'art</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as técnicas de desenhar a arte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le tecniche di dissipare arte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι τεχνικές την τέχνη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las técnicas de trazar arte</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">9. Jahrhundert, zeichnende Verfahren, Kohleabgehobener 
Betrag, Kreideabgehobener Betrag, Wad, silberne Stange, douche, 
pendraw</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">9ème siècle, démarches de dessin, aspiration de 
charbon, aspiration de craie, bouchon, tige argentée, douche, 
pendraw</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ø século, continuações desenhando, tração de 
carvão, tração do giz, wad, haste de prata, douche, pendraw</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nono secolo, atti dissipanti, tiraggio del carbone, 
tiraggio del gesso, wad, asta d'argento, douche, pendraw</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ο 9ος αιώνας, που σύρει τα πρακτικά, άνθρακας σύρει, η 
κιμωλία σύρει, wad, ασημένια ράβδος, douche, pendraw</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">9no siglo, procedimientos que trazan, drenaje del 
carbón, drenaje de la tiza, taco, barra de plata, douche, pendraw</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

    </metadata>
